info.title: Backbone Freshdesk SKU Usage Collector API
info.description:
- alpha: Currently developed API version. Subject to major changes.
- beta: A semi-stable early access version. New features can be added. Breaking changes are possible.
- stable: The API is recommended for use in production.

[Changelog](https://freshdesk-sku-usage-collector-api.conqore.niceshops.com/v1/docs/changelog.html)

All data is transferred in UTF-8 encoding.\
The API uses stateless HTTP. No cookies have to be kept.\
Authentication via OAuth2 client credentials flow.

[Backbone Freshdesk SKU Usage Collector API PHP client @Packagist](https://packagist.org/packages/datenkraft/bb-freshdesk-sku-usage-collector-api-php-client)
